Detailed Description

Describes a parametrically defined circle in 3D space.

normal The normal of the circle (i.e. a vector perpendicular to the plane of the circle)

bool DzCircle3::minDistToLine ( const DzLine3 &  line,
DzVec3 &  lineClosest,
DzVec3 &  circleClosest 
) const
Parameters:
line The line to test against
lineClosest The point on the line closest to the circle
circleClosest The point on the circle closest to the line.
Returns:
The minimum distance between this circle and the given line. Also returns the actual 3D points corresponding to the nearest point on the line and on the circle.
bool DzCircle3::operator!= ( const DzCircle3 &  circle  )  const

Inequality Operator

Returns:
true if the two circles are different, otherwise false.

Equality Operator

Returns:
true if the two circles are the same, otherwise false.
